group_1.narration: — Iroha —@This branch from the Uwasa of the Eternal@Sakura bloomed after Eve touched it.
— Iroha —@Because all four of us reunited at last!
— Iroha —@Me and Touka and Nemu and Ui...@It blossomed because we all met again!

group_1.textRight: Worrying over it won't help us, Touka.
Yes, it seems that what Iroha Tamaki said@had some level of truth to it.
But the fact remains that we have no memory@of any of the things she mentioned.
We gain nothing from listening to her now.

group_1.textLeft: I KNOW that. I'm not worried.

group_1.textRight: I love the looks on your faces right now,@though.

group_1.textLeft: Urrrgh, whatever! Shut! Up!

group_1.textRight: That Iroha Tamaki and her memories...
I, Alina, think it might be fun to try@believing what she says.

group_1.textLeft: What are you saying?

group_1.textRight: It just seems far too misterioso when I@think about it...
I understand why I've joined forces with@the two of you.
Yet I've always felt somewhat strange,@working alongside girls as young as you.

group_1.textLeft: Well we can say the same about you.
Trusting you is an inherently dangerous act.@Too dangerous, really.

group_1.textRight: Perhaps Iroha Tamaki's memories are the key@to answering all our questions.
I suspect they very well might.
That is why I, Alina, spared her life back@at the Eternal Sakura.
And why at Fendt Hope I ordered her brought@to us, hoping to recover her memories.

group_1.textLeft: I knew there was something odd about that...
Okay, enough's enough! No more talk about@Iroha Tamaki's memories!
None of that gives us any reason to believe@her.
And I will not be convinced otherwise!

group_1.textRight: Huh... Well, all right.
I, Alina, don't much care either way.
I'll be perfectly contento as long as Eve@hatches.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! That's what we should focus on!
All those electric waves we sent out when@summoning Walpurgisnacht here...
They helped spread its Familiars all over the@place!
We should be calmly surveying our progress,@not talking about weird hypotheticals.

group_1.textRight: I agree.
Whether we believe in her memories or not@is not worth debating at this point.
Due to my machinations, Kamihama now appears@like a paradise on Earth to Witches.
If their Familiars spread throughout the city@Magical Girls will have their hands full.
That means there'll be no one standing in@the way of Eve's breakfast.
Now all we have to do is sit back and wait@for our plan to succeed.
So what do we do now?
Just sit and watch as the city spills over@with Familiars?

group_1.textLeft: No, I want to stop that too.

group_1.textRight: Listen, even I don't want to push you on@this, but...
Eve isn't moving right now. Now's our best@chance to...

group_1.textLeft: I understand what you're trying to say.
But could you kill Iroha's younger sister,@Rena?

group_1.textRight: Well...I...

group_1.textLeft: I feel the same way. I couldn't do it. Not@when it came right down to it.
She hasn't fully become a Witch yet, so it's@still possible we could save her.

group_1.textRight: Yeah. And that changes everything...
We don't have much time, but we really@need to come up with some other way.

group_1.textLeft: I think so, too...
Maybe there's some way we can save her,@instead of just destroying her.

group_1.textRight: Plus, we all decided to share our problems,@right? So we'll all take it on together!

group_1.textLeft: Felicia...

group_1.textRight: Yes. Don't be so hard on yourself, Iroha.
When our team reunited back at Chelation@Land...
We all made a pact to share our burdens,@just like Felicia said.
Besides, if there's one thing we all know...
It's how much you care for your sister.

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo...

group_1.textRight: That said...
I don't intend to press you on the issue at @all, but you must prepare yourself.
There could be some way to save Ui.
But we can't just sit, watching the world@burn, while we figure out how.
Rena's right about that much.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
Eeek!

group_1.textRight: Was that Eve just now?

group_1.textLeft: Is she trying to do something?

group_1.textRight: Just because she isn't rampaging doesn't@mean she'll just lie still.
She's still determined to go towards@Walpurgisnacht.

group_1.textLeft: Eve's still trying to move?!

group_1.textRight: Yes.
So let's attack her before she manages it.

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo?!

group_1.textRight: You heard what I said. You need to be @prepared.
Eve is trying to go to the center of town. We@can't ignore that.
We'll have to think of a way to save your@sister while we weaken her.

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.textRight: I'm not planning on ending her life.
This is just to stop her from doing anything@bad.
I don't want Ui to regret what she did once@she comes back to us.
I'm with Yachiyo.
Don't worry, Iroha.
Even if we stand against her, Eve's not@goin' down easily.

group_1.textLeft: I know that, but...
I just can't stand the thought of hurting@Ui, even when she looks so different.
I know logically we need to do this, but...

group_1.textRight: Oh, Iroha...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry. I'm just the worst...

group_1.textRight: No, don't say that!
Eeek!!!
Did that thing just squish its stomach flat?
Hey, we'd better hurry up here, or there's@no tellin' what that bug's gonna do!

group_1.textLeft: Iroha!

group_1.textRight: Are you with us on this, Iroha?

group_1.textLeft: Ui... Do I really have to fight you?
